column4: Can anyone assist in enabling 1650x1080 on my desktop? There is no option in my nvidia x server and I'm afraid I'll have to edit my xorg-conf
I tried putting the resolution under the "advanced" tab in the nvidia x server settings and it worked, now my desktop is expanded beyond the sixe ogf my monitor
let me take a look, one moment.
where would I see the panning options at? I'm sorry.
Oh, that's where I put it 1650x1080. that's what's under panning. I put that in manually.
in nvidia x server settings ->  xserver display config ->  Display tab
I input 1680x1050 manually and that didn't do anything but expand my screen haha
what monitor do you have? brand and model?
I'm pretty sure it's a LG L226WT-BF 22-inch Widescreen
any ideas? My monitor and video card support the resolution.
did you make a typo? apparently, that command does not exist.
greping monitorrange didnt provide results, do you just want me to pastebin the output?
